Widget.name: Breadcrumbs
Widget.Description: This widget displays breadcrumb links allowing you to navigate through the structured hierarchy of a facet. Typical breadcrumbs look like this: Parent node > Child node > Grandchild node.

Option.name: Separator
Option.Description: Specifies the separator to use between breadcrumbs.

Option.name: Displays refinement links
Option.Description: Specifies whether the breadcrumbs must be displayed as clickable links.

Option.name: Destination page on click
Option.Description: Indicates the URL that must be accessed for a refinement option. If blank, you stay on the same page.

Option.name: Force refinement for feeds
Option.Description: Forces refinements on the specified feeds.
